description: This file defines API endpoints for authentication-related operations using the FastAPI framework. It includes registration, login, fetching, and updating user profiles, interacting with a database via SQLAlchemy ORM and handling JWT token creation.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI's router class used to define and group API endpoints.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User ORM model representing user data in the database.

methods.name: TokenResponse register(payload: RegisterRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to register a new user and return a JWT token.

methods.name: TokenResponse login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate a user and return a JWT token.

methods.name: UserPublic me(current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve the current authenticated user's public profile.

methods.name: UserPublic update_me( payload: UserUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Endpoint to update the current user's profile information.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(payload: RegisterRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/

ctags.name: update_me
ctags.signature: ( payload: UserUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
